data.title: David Andrew Fisher Obituary 2003

data.meta_site_name: Routsong Funeral Home and Cremation Services
data.text:
age 42, of Marietta, formerly of Kettering, passed away, Sunday, February 9, 2003, as a result of an ATV accident. David was a 1978 graduate of Fairmont East High School. He was currently working for Ameritech. Survived by his fiancee, Wanda Erb; parents, Andy and Eve Fisher of Kettering; two sisters and brothers-in-law, Robin and John Harshe of Kettering and Karen and Bill Wallace of Louisiana; nieces and nephews, Christina, Eric and Alex. Memorial service will be held on Thursday, Feb. 13, 2003, at 7:00 PM at the Routsong Funeral Home, 2100 E. Stroop Rd., Kettering. Family will greet friends one hour prior to the memorial service (6-7:00 PM) at the funeral home. If desired, memorial contributions may be made to Hospice of Dayton, 324 Wilmington Ave., Dayton, OH 45401. Condolences may be sent to the family via the funeral home's website at www.routsong.com.

Funeral Home:

Kettering Routsong Funeral Home

2100 E. Stroop Rd.

Kettering, OH

US 45429
